function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exclusion of studies with high log reductions","Impact":"Limited use of valuable research data","Mitigation":"Consider alternative methods for incorporating high log reduction values","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, statistical modeling","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, academic departments"},{"Description":"Bias due to pseudo-replication","Impact":"Inaccurate or skewed Z value calculations","Mitigation":"Use appropriate statistical methods to account for pseudo-replication","Technologies":"Statistical software, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, academic departments"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in effective upper-room Z value for aerosolised SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of UV-C effectiveness for SARS-CoV-2 in aerosolized form","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to narrow down the range of possible values for c_ur","Technologies":"Research instruments, experimental setups","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, academic departments"}]}
